features.name: Healthcare & Medical Features
features.template:
import { Heart, Shield, Clock, Users, Award, Stethoscope } from 'lucide-react' interface FeaturesProps { headline: string description: string features: Array<{ icon: string title: string description: string highlight?: string }> patientStats: { yearsExperience: string patientsServed: string satisfactionRate: string } } const iconMap = { heart: Heart, shield: Shield, clock: Clock, users: Users, award: Award, stethoscope: Stethoscope } export default function Features({ headline, description, features, patientStats }: FeaturesProps) { return (

{headline}

{description}

{/* Patient Stats */}
{patientStats.yearsExperience}
Years Experience
{patientStats.patientsServed}
Patients Served
{patientStats.satisfactionRate}
Satisfaction Rate
{features.map((feature, index) => { const IconComponent = iconMap[feature.icon as keyof typeof iconMap] || Heart return (

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

{feature.highlight && (
{feature.highlight}
)}
) })}
HIPAA Compliant ‚Ä¢ Licensed Healthcare Providers
) }

features.name: Home Services Features
features.description: Reliable features for home service contractors with guarantees
features.template:
import { Wrench, Shield, Clock, MapPin, Award, CheckCircle } from 'lucide-react' interface FeaturesProps { headline: string description: string features: Array<{ icon: string title: string description: string guarantee?: string }> serviceInfo: { responseTime: string serviceAreas: string yearsExperience: string jobsCompleted: string } } const iconMap = { wrench: Wrench, shield: Shield, clock: Clock, mapPin: MapPin, award: Award, check: CheckCircle } export default function Features({ headline, description, features, serviceInfo }: FeaturesProps) { return (

{headline}

{description}

{/* Service Stats */}
{serviceInfo.responseTime}
Response Time
{serviceInfo.yearsExperience}
Years Experience
{serviceInfo.jobsCompleted}
Jobs Completed
Service Areas
{serviceInfo.serviceAreas}
{features.map((feature, index) => { const IconComponent = iconMap[feature.icon as keyof typeof iconMap] || Wrench return (

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

{feature.guarantee && (
‚úì {feature.guarantee}
)}
) })}
Licensed, Bonded & Insured ‚Ä¢ 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
) }
